ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ka guɔ táʼ, mémbàʼ naʼá ńgÿo.
en: I was sick but I have a slight relief.

ngiemboon: Jú mepɔ̀ɔn membòŋo, ńná né yé.
en: Buy the best bags to give to him.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge nkẅì, ɔ̀ náa melÿɔʼ membÿag ngie ngáa?
en: I'm single and you give me the raw yams, what should I do?

ngiemboon: N ge gẅiin meshʉ̀a é tó.
en: I will come when I have a little space of time.
The oil has poured out, go buy more.
